biocontainers.name: sdrf-pipelines
biocontainers.summary: Translate, convert SDRF to configuration pipelines

biotools.summary: The SDRF pipelines provide a set of tools to validate and convert SDRF files to different workflow configuration files such as MSstats,OpenMS and MaxQuant.

bioschemas.name: sdrf-pipelines
bioschemas.summary: The SDRF pipelines provide a set of tools to validate and convert SDRF files to different workflow configuration files such as MSstats,OpenMS and MaxQuant.
